text: Jouko Innanen (29 October 1952 – 1 October 2019) was a Finnish cartoonist.Pilapiirtäjä Jouko on kuollut Innanen's cartoons were published in the magazines Iltalehti, Turun Sanomat, Länsi-Savo, Itä-Savo and Länsiväylä. He died in Savonlinna. ==Bibliography== *Till . Espoo: Western Fairway , 1986. *Suominen Molli . Helsingfors: Ottawa, 1992. *Herr Kaaranen . Helsingfors: Automediat, 2010. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Finnish artists Category:Cartoonists
title: Jouko Innanen
